item.title: GAMETHING
item.description: GAMETHING A podcast by David Wolinsky (@davidwolinsky, Don’t Die), Pippin Barr, and Mark Chains. Released one episode per week when each season is ready. (Subscribe to our newsletter to hear when new seasons are ready.) The episodes are short. You might as well listen to one. Season 1 (2018) GAMETHING · GAMETHING, season 1 Season 2 (2019) GAMETHING · GAMETHING, season 2 Links GAMETHING on SoundCloud GAMETHING on Apple Podcast
